attributes.action: ask the Scottish government to reconsider the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Aberdeen Western Peripheral Road is a new 70mph in places 3 lane bypass of Aberdeen which skirts residential areas.  The scheme is old-fashioned and parochial.  Drivers will come off it into residential areas not realising what speed they are driving.  Emissions are much higher at 70mph.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
